scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run sass
scripts.watch: npm run watch-dist & npm run watch-sass & wait
scripts.watchall: npm run watch-dist & npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-tests & wait
scripts.buildall: npm run build-dist && npm run build-tests
scripts.build-tests: mkdir -p dist/ && browserify test/karma-qunit-shim.js test/*-test.js -u test/karma.conf.js -s videojs-dock -d -o dist/tests.js
scripts.watch-tests: mkdir -p dist/ && watchify test/karma-qunit-shim.js test/*-test.js -u test/karma.conf.js -s videojs-dock -v -d -o dist/tests.js
scripts.test: jshint src/**.js test/**.js index.js && npm run build-tests && karma start test/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist/ && browserify -t browserify-shim . -s videojs-dock -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run dist && npm run sass
scripts.test-watch: npm run watch-tests & karma start test/karma.conf.js --auto-watch & wait
